释义: 一会儿；一段时间 / （对比两件事物）然而

单词/短语: a person with strong mind = a strong-minded person
Join in an activity = take part in
to make drivers safer at night
释义: 让驾驶员在夜晚更安全

单词/短语: the life-changing ideas come into being
on the handle of the stick

最终（final 为 adj.，finally 为 adv.）
沉没（原形 - 过去式 - 过去分词）
感到失望（应为 feel disappointed）

单词/短语: be good at = be well in
